description: This file defines the AppEnv class providing environment configuration access via environment variables, including API base URL, WebSocket URL, and debug mode status.

classes.name: AppEnv
classes.description: A utility class providing access to environment variables such as API endpoints and debug status.

methods.name: apiBaseUrl
methods.description: Returns the API base URL from environment variables or a default local URL.

methods.name: wsUrl
methods.description: Returns the WebSocket URL from environment variables or a default local WebSocket URL.

methods.name: isDebug
methods.description: Determines whether the application is running in debug mode based on environment variable.
